gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Wizards 107, Bulls 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Wizards defeated the Bulls, 107-105. Jordan Poole recorded 23 points, five assists and four 3PM for the Wizards, while Corey Kispert (19 points, 12 rebounds) and Richaun Holmes (14 points, 15 rebounds) added a combined 33 points and 27 rebounds in the victory. DeMar DeRozan put up 27 points, six assists and a season-high five steals for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Wizards win their third game in a row as they improve to 14-58 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 34-38.
